text: import java.net.*; import java.io.*; public class DayTimeClient { public static void main(String[] args) { try { Socket socket = new Socket("time.nist.gov", 13); socket.setSoTimeout (15000) ; InputStream in = socket.getInputStream() ; int c; while ((c = in.read())!'= -1) System.out.print ((char)c); socket.close(); } catch (IOException ex) { System.err.println(ex) ;} } o}
